demolition

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Loader

  • public class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads in the level(s) as level objects based on config files provided

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Loader() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Level> loadAllFiles(processing.core.PApplet app, java.lang.String configFileName)
      Loads all the level files specified by the configFile to be used for the game
      static Level loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename, int time, int lives, processing.core.PApplet app)
      Loads one level based on the file name, time limit for the level, the lives for the player, where all levels must only have one starting position and one finish position and must be 13x13.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllFiles

        public static java.util.List<Level> loadAllFiles(processing.core.PApplet app,
                                                 java.lang.String configFileName)
        Loads all the level files specified by the configFile to be used for the game
        Parameters:
        app - the app object used to run the game
        configFileName - the string representation of the config file name
        Returns:
        A list containing all the levels specified by the txt files listed in the central configfile

      • loadFromFile

        public static Level loadFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                 int time,
                                 int lives,
                                 processing.core.PApplet app)
        Loads one level based on the file name, time limit for the level, the lives for the player, where all levels must only have one starting position and one finish position and must be 13x13.
        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the txt file containing the level's configurations
        time - the time limit to complete the level
        lives - the number of lives the player has in total
        app - the app object used to run the game
        Returns:
        the level loaded from the filename
